languages.text: "Твои чувства подводят тебя, Эклендиль. Погибли... не все". {n}Ирлиэт резко поворачивается и указывает на игровую доску с запечатанной душой провидицы.{/n} "Я была не в силах ее спасти, но ты... Ты мог бы попробовать".

traits.locale_text: "Твои чувства подводят тебя, Эклендиль. Погибли... не все". {n}Ирлиэт резко поворачивается и указывает на игровую доску с запечатанной душей провидицы.{/n} "Я была не в силах ее спасти, но ты... Ты мог бы попробовать".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."
languages.original_text: "Твои чувства подводят тебя, Эклендиль. Погибли... не все". {n}Ирлиэт резко поворачивается и указывает на игровую доску с запечатанной душой провидицы.{/n} "Я была не в силах ее спасти, но ты... Ты мог бы попробовать".

traits.locale_text: "Your feelings could serve you better than that, Eklendyl. There were... survivors." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board with the Farseer's soul sealed inside.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... You could have tried."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your feelings could serve you better than that, Eklendyl. There were... survivors." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board with the Farseer's soul sealed inside.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... You could have tried."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tus sentidos te fallan, Eklendyl. Murieron muchos... pero no todos». {n}Yrliet se gira bruscamente y señala al tablero de juego que contiene el alma de la vidente.{/n} «Yo no fui capaz de salvarla, pero tú... tú ni siquiera lo intentaste».
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: «Tus sentidos te fallan, Eklendyl. Murieron muchos... pero no todos». {n}Yrliet se gira bruscamente y señala al tablero de juego que contiene el alma de la vidente.{/n} «Yo no fui capaz de salvarla, pero tú... tú ni siquiera lo intentaste».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エクレンディル、あなたの感は役に立たなかった。多くの者が死んだが…全てではない」{n}ユリエットは鋭く振り返り、先見司の魂が入った遊戯盤を指差した。{/n} 「我は彼女を救えなかったが、あなたは….あなたなら救えたはずだ」
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: 「エクレンディル、あなたの感は役に立たなかった。多くの者が死んだが…全てではない」{n}ユリエットは鋭く振り返り、先見司の魂が入った遊戯盤を指差した。{/n} 「我は彼女を救えなかったが、あなたは….あなたなら救えたはずだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “你感觉错了，埃克伦迪。很多人都死了……还有活着的人。”{n}伊莉耶特迅速转过身，指向藏着先知灵魂的棋盘。{/n}“我救不了她，但你……你可以试试。”
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: “你感觉错了，埃克伦迪。很多人都死了……还有活着的人。”{n}伊莉耶特迅速转过身，指向藏着先知灵魂的棋盘。{/n}“我救不了她，但你……你可以试试。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Vos sens vous trahissent, Eklendyl. Beaucoup sont morts... mais pas tous. » {n}Yrliet se tourne brusquement et pointe un doigt vers le plateau de jeu contenant l'âme du Grand Prophète.{/n} « Je n'ai pas pu la sauver, mais vous... Vous auriez pu essayer. »
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: « Vos sens vous trahissent, Eklendyl. Beaucoup sont morts... mais pas tous. » {n}Yrliet se tourne brusquement et pointe un doigt vers le plateau de jeu contenant l'âme du Grand Prophète.{/n} « Je n'ai pas pu la sauver, mais vous... Vous auriez pu essayer. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Eure Sinne lassen nach, Eklendyl. Viele starben ... aber nicht alle." {n}Schnell dreht sich Yrliet um und zeigt aufs Spielbrett mit der gefangenen Seele des Runenpropheten.{/n} "Ich konnte sie nicht retten, aber Ihr ... Ihr hättet es wenigstens versuchen können."
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Sinne lassen nach, Eklendyl. Viele starben ... aber nicht alle." {n}Schnell dreht sich Yrliet um und zeigt aufs Spielbrett mit der gefangenen Seele des Runenpropheten.{/n} "Ich konnte sie nicht retten, aber Ihr ... Ihr hättet es wenigstens versuchen können."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hislerin seni yanıltıyor Eklendyl. Hepsi olmasa da... Çoğu öldü." {n}Yrliet, aniden arkasına dönerek Ötesezen'in ruhunu içeren oyun tahtasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Onu kurtarmayı başaramadım ama sen... Sen deneyebilirdin."
languages.original_text: "Your senses fail you, Eklendyl. Many died... but not all." {n}Yrliet turns around sharply and points to the game board containing the Farseer's soul.{/n} "I was unable to save her, but you... you could have tried."

traits.locale_text: "Hislerin seni yanıltıyor Eklendyl. Çoğu öldü... Ama tamamı ölmedi." {n}Yrliet, aniden arkasına dönerek Ötesezen'in ruhunu içeren oyun tahtasını işaret ediyor.{/n} "Onu kurtarmayı başaramadım ama sen... Sen deneyebilirdin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
